title: My child was given easy 6 vaccine at 6 weeks vaccination. Is it a painless vaccine?

cleaned_text: Get the App For Doctors Login/Sign-up Shield360 Consult Online Book Appointment Ask a Question Plan my Surgery GoodKart Health Feed Health Query Share Bookmark Report My child was given easy 6 vaccine at 6 weeks vaccination. Is it a painless vaccine? 1Doctor Answered [Dr. Shripad Kulkarni](/thane/doctor/dr-shripad-kulkarni-pediatrician)Pediatrician35yrs exp Ask Free Question You should yourself know by now if it is painless. Anyway it is not painless. [Pain](https://www.lybrate.com/topic/pain) is a subjective phenomenon, experienced with different grades of severity by different babies. 1 person found this helpful Was this answer helpful?
